text: Sa muda agiunghet una variatzione genètica noa, e sa seletzione la bogat dae su grupu de variatziones espressadas.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Sardinian: Sa muda agiunghet una variatzione genètica noa, e sa seletzione la bogat dae su grupu de variatziones espressadas.

text: Dae chi s’istrachia est ancora a tesu dae sa terra, est difìtzile a valutare s’efetu potentziale pro sos Istados Unidos o sos Caràibes.
translated_text:
Sardinian: Sa Turchia est inghiriada dae su mare dae tres chirrus: dae su Mare Egeu dae otzidente, dae su Mare Nieddu dae susu e dae su Mare Mediterràneu dae josso. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Sardinian: A su cumintzu de sa gherra biazaiant mescamente is su pìgiu de su mare, ma dae chi sos radar aiant cumintzadu a los iscobèrrere e a èssere prus pretzisos sos sutamarinos fiant obligados a si nche andare a suta de s’abba pro evitare chi los esserent bidos. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
